snippet: Georgia Tech’s DeAndre Smelter, a baseball prospect who turned to football only this season, is the latest wide receiver to excel in the Yellow Jackets’ run-oriented offense.
lead_paragraph: Georgia Tech’s DeAndre Smelter, a baseball prospect who turned to football only this season, is the latest wide receiver to excel in the Yellow Jackets’ run-oriented offense.

headline.main: Georgia Tech Runs First, But Receivers Still Excel
headline.print_headline: Georgia Tech Runs First, But Receivers Still Excel
